description:
Cody Cummings was with a work crew, trying to repair a busted water main, when the pipes burst. He was soaked on a freezing morning, with no dry clothes. Cody went looking for a place to dry off when he happened upon the home of Kelly Summers.

Kelly is a lonely girl who's delighted to welcome the shirtless Cody inside. She knows that to warm the entire body, the cock should needs to be sucked thoroughly. Cody likes the idea and soon these two are in front of the fireplace, fucking like lost explorers in a chilly mountaintop cabin.

Enjoy!
title: A dirty fuck by a stranger warms Cody
